Judul: ANALYSING THE DETERMINANTS OF ARREARS RATE IN SHARIA MICROFINANCE: CASE STUDY OF BAITUT TAMWIL TAMZIS
Abstrak: This research has purpose to determine is there any statistically significant relationship between some factors of financing (plafon, tenor, main installment, purpose of financing, installment pattern, applicant source) and arrears rate. The method used is multi-linear regression. The data used is secondary data from Baitut Tamwil Tamzis database. The data used is from August, 2011 until Maret, 2018. It consist of independent variable: plafon, tenor, and main installment, applicant source, purpose of financing, installment pattern. For the dependent variable used is the arrears. The arrears is categorized into four risk index categories with each characteristic and conditions.
Kata Kunci: NPF, arrears rate, Baitut Tamwil, determinants, multi-linear regression, arrears.
